1530830.name: Save the Pirate: Ice age
1530830.description: Save the Pirate: Ice Age tells the story of how a pirate and his companion got to the Ice Island. The player needs to get down to business wisely and make the right choice in order to complete the story successfully and help the heroes get off the island and not get too cold. The main goal - the pirate must quickly explore the island and find how to warm up his companion. To complete the game successfully, you need to use your logic and make the right choice from the two available.
1530830.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*, 德语*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙*, 法语*, 阿拉伯语*, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲*, 简体中文*, 乌克兰语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
